Articles.Content: exited to finally fly to eve

I'm very excited to see how will work the procedural wings on the planes!

Edited February 22, 2023 by Pgabrielmnecraft
I'm excited to see these beautiful new planets!
I'm excited to continuation this series with a new visual effects and procedural parts.

I'm excited for stock procedural wings, and the authentic rocket engine sounds!  I look forward to the release of career mode and multiplayer. I'm also hoping for highly quality atmospheric flight, and maybe fixed-wing autopilot.
I’m excited for multiplayer and the slaying of the kraken!
I’m ready for the new explosions
I'm excited for a fun and great excuse to teach my kids about science! And kerbals and explosions! Thanks dev team for putting all this together!

Articles.CreatedByName: i dont know how to forum
Articles.Content: I'm excited about many of the new parts available in Early Access. Acceleration under warp too, that alone is a huge change. More generally I've only ever been as far as Duna in KSP1, so I'm excited to finally go visit every celestial body, especially to hear all the new music.
Excited for good stock graphics! I never got into graphic mods for KSP1 so I'm excited for everything to look so good without any mods!
I'm excited to see the kerbals return, with new interstellar tech, buildings, and the ability to play with friends!
I'm excited to actually colonize the worlds, to have a reason to travel to them beyond "That looks cool", to build cities in the stars and across their surfaces.

I'm excited to explore, go further than any kerbal has gone before, find and settle new places on the known and yet to be discovered worlds and do so with sometimes extremely over-engineered spacecraft, planes and rovers. I'm excited to witness the different suns rise above horizons yet undreamed and unseen by kerbalkind. I'm excited to push the envelope and to dare to dream of the stars themselves being within my reach.
I am exited to be able to build on my progress with each successive update
Im exited about the multiplayer cant wait to play with friends
I can’t wait for all the optimization and updates on the future
I really like the looks of the new VAB and KSC, the build procedure looks miles better than KSP1 and the KSC looks both epic and Kerbal.
I’m excited for the new wings! I’ve always wanted to make good looking planes in KSP, but I didn’t like the previous wing system. Now I get to fail and crash horribly try it out!

I'm excited for new wings, colonies, colonising other star systems and the ability to do it with a friend. Improved graphics is a plus too.

And of course, the smooth crashing without lags.
Im excited for my craft to NOT be killed by physics glitches
I am excited for the beautiful new game!
I'm looking forward to releasing the Kraken.  Most of all, I look forward to an updated aerodynamic model that will better facilitate my spaceplane-based space program.
I'm excited about better mod support, want to hope that modders will be able to really show off all their talents
Excited for a more realistic, immersive experience, with the good-old kerbal feel to it.
Im super exited for the lading screens.
